Title: Relates to establishing a pilot grant program in Erie county to explore the effectiveness of tree removal in combatting the spread of emerald ash borer
Summary: Relates to establishing a pilot grant program in Erie county to explore the effectiveness of tree removal in combatting the spread of emerald ash borer.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 674 of the laws of 2007, amending the environmental conservation law, relating to creating the New York invasive species council, in relation to establishing a pilot grant program in Erie county to explore the effectiveness of tree removal in combatting the spread of emerald ash borer
